Core Angular Essentials

Learn the fundamentals of Angular development

Core Concepts

  • Components

    The core UI building block - compose the user interface by combining multiple components.

  • JSX

    Return JSX code to define the actual markup that will be rendered.

  • Props

    Make components configurable by passing input data to them.

  • State

    Angular-managed data which, when changed, causes the component to re-render.

Examples

Please select a topic to see examples.
